text: Frank Kelly (né Francis O'Kelly; 28 December 1938 – 28 February 2016) was an Irish actor, singer and writer. He worked in television, radio, theatre, music, screenwriting and movies. He played Father Jack Hackett in the Channel Four sitcom Father Ted. He also played Dermont in Emmerdale. Kelly died on 28 February 2016 from a heart attack. The heart attack was a complication of Parkinson's disease. He was 77. He was recovering from bowel cancer and survived skin cancer. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:People with Parkinson's disease Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish television actors Category:Irish stage actors Category:Irish voice actors Category:Singers from Dublin Category:Irish screenwriters Category:Actors from Dublin
title: Frank Kelly
